thread.title: Linkin Park Unveil New Album Cover, New Single Details [News]
thread.title_full: Linkin Park Unveil New Album Cover, New Single Details [News]

title: Linkin Park Unveil New Album Cover, New Single Details [News]
text:
Linkin Park Unveil New Album Cover, New Single Details The band shared another studio video too... UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 14 hours ago 13 
Linkin Park have unveiled the cover art for their new album. 
The reveal came as the end result of a digital puzzle sourced through various "ambassadors" of the band across social media. 
They also posted the lyrics for the first single from the upcoming album titled "Heavy" via genius.com . That song is to feature a guest vocals by Kiiara. 
Additionally, Linkin Park shared another studio video for the new album, featuring female vocals - you can find it below.
